name: slack-ai-assistant
description: Cloud Runで動作するSlack AIアシスタントボット

scripts.deploy: sh -c 'source .env && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/$(gcloud config get-value project)/slack-ai-assistant && gcloud run deploy slack-ai-assistant --image gcr.io/$(gcloud config get-value project)/slack-ai-assistant --platform managed --region asia-northeast1 --memory=1Gi --allow-unauthenticated --service-account=slack-pdf-drive-sa@slack-ai-assistant-452809.iam.gserviceaccount.com --update-env-vars SLACK_BOT_TOKEN=$SLACK_BOT_TOKEN,SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET=$SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET,GOOGLE_DRIVE_FOLDER_ID=$GOOGLE_DRIVE_FOLDER_ID,OPENAI_API_KEY=$OPENAI_API_KEY,PINECONE_API_KEY=$PINECONE_API_KEY,PINECONE_ENVIRONMENT=$PINECONE_ENVIRONMENT,PINECONE_INDEX=$PINECONE_INDEX'
